title: Khaled Hosseini | Manafort Flips on Trump; Kavanaugh Accused of Sexual Assault: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at President Trump's ex-campaign chairman flipping on him and the sexual assault allegations leveled against his Supreme Court nominee, Brett Kavanaugh.

Writer Khaled Hosseini talks about leaving his career as a doctor to become a full-time writer, his novel Sea Prayer and how everyone can help refugees in their own communities. He also talks to Late Night producer Henry Melcher backstage at Studio 8G.


LATE NIGHT ON SOCIAL
